abstract: Lazard and Evercore Partners reported Thursday that their core mergers advisory businesses had held up well on the strength of several major transactions.
snippet: Lazard and Evercore Partners reported Thursday that their core mergers advisory businesses had held up well on the strength of several major transactions.
lead_paragraph: 8:52 p.m. | Updated While much of Wall Street is struggling with constant upheavals in the global market, two of the industry’s independent investment banks are faring better than their bigger rivals.

headline.main: Major Deals Help 2 Banks Outperform Larger Rivals

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
